data.title: Convenient and Versatile: Transparent Tape - A Must-Have for Home, School, and Office Supplies
data.body: The WOSWEL Transparent Tape Refills come in a bulk pack containing 48 rolls, providing an abundance of clear tape for various tasks. Each roll measures 3/4 inch by 1000 inches, ensuring ample tape for multiple projects without the hassle of frequent replacements. With its glossy finish and transparent design, this tape seamlessly blends with any surface, offering a neat and professional appearance. The adhesive strength is just right, providing a secure bond without leaving residue behind when removed. These tapes adhere well to paper, cardboard, plastic, and other materials, making them suitable for a wide range of applications. The compact size of each roll facilitates easy storage and transport, while the dispenser-friendly design allows for smooth and effortless application.
